description: doc: no more mention of Makefile or gomake

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On Sat, Feb 25, 2012 at 5:36 AM, <r@golang.org> wrote:

>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5700061/diff/4001/doc/install-**
> source.html<http://codereview.appspot.com/5700061/diff/4001/doc/install-source.html>
> File doc/install-source.html (right):
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**5700061/diff/4001/doc/install-**
> source.html#newcode327<http://codereview.appspot.com/5700061/diff/4001/doc/install-source.html#newcode327>
> doc/install-source.html:327: You won't need to set this most of the
> time.
> This raises the question of when I will need to set it.
>
I agree, and the user should never need to set it.
AFAIK, the only program that need it is cmd/yacc/units.y.

>
> this whole document needs work and is slated to get work this week. for
> now, how about just deleting the make sentence and not adding anything
> in its place?
>
If it is scheduled to get work this week then I'd rather hold this CL and
make
sure this small fix will get included.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5700061/diff/4001/doc/install-source.html
File doc/install-source.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5700061/diff/4001/doc/install-source.html#newcode327
doc/install-source.html:327: You won't need to set this most of the time.
This raises the question of when I will need to set it.

this whole document needs work and is slated to get work this week. for now, how about just deleting the make sentence and not adding anything in its place?

subject: code review 5700061: doc: no more mention of Makefile or gomake
